description:
Takashi Kamiyama has enrolled in Cromartie High School, known for its rough characters and rowdy demeanors. As a "rabbit among lions," Kamiyama will get a crash course on what it means to be tough, and why nicknames and having a strong back are of vital importance.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: "I Was Once Bad" Bragging Contest / Let`s Debut / Fight Club / Rock You / Welcome to the Jungle
